index.presentation: Full Stack Developer based in Entre Rios, Argentina.
about.title: About me
about.h2: Hi there! Let me introduce myself...
about.p1: I am a Computer Technician and Full Stack Web Developer, graduated from Henry's academy. I am passionate about new technologies, software development, cybersecurity, blockchain, web3 and programming languages. I stand out for being proactive, autonomous and for having great facility to learn new technologies and tools. I improve every day to acquire best practices and expose them in my work. My goal is to stand out as a professional developer, offering efficient and innovative solutions. I like both backend and frontend. At the moment, I am looking for new opportunities and I am eager and enthusiastic to participate in a close team, facing challenges and being helpful.
about.p2: Thank you for taking the time to read about me.

projects.henryGames.description: Individual project done at Henry's Bootcamp, is an application to search and create game information, filter by name, rating, genre and origin.
projects.rgbTech.description: E-commerce of technological products, focused on technology fans and gamers. It has an administrator panel, user database, access with Google and much more. For more information, check the repository.
